name: Chess Parallel Esports
detailed_description:
Chess battle is re-imagined as 3D in this variation of chess.

"Value your intelligence"

Feel the sense of pleasure to say checkmate, paste! in the space.
Dreams first occur in 3D infinity.
Fictionalize the systematics of new openings, mid-games and endgames.
We provide innovative thinking ability with forward-backward and right-left moves in different dimensions.
The hunt will turn into a hunter. The footsteps will come from both below and above.
Enjoy your first discovering pleasure. Turn it into an adventure without haste.
Play it many times. Try to find the rules of movement of the stones ower time as you play.
İmprove your own codes in Chess (CPE) if you always consider that human should surpass the artificial intelligence.
Chess Parallel Esports will be very easy even for the people who has just learnt literacy or for those who forgot to play chess we brought a new rule regarding how the pieces move: They can make 2 consecutive moves in 3D vertical ways, while they make normal 1 move on the same board they are.

Features:
  • 3D chess system with 3 boards
  • Fully animated 3D pieces, which can engage in battle with each other
  • AI with 3 difficulty modes
  • Local multiplayer
  • Regular mode (the 2D classical chess)
  • 9 different combinations to start the game
  • Possibility to play with classical chess pieces
  • 9 different scholar's mate

Note: You can rotate the system by keeping mouse button pressed. With scroll wheel, you can zoom in and out.

Note 2: Federation competition rules, chess rules and referee rules are applied.

short_description: Chess battle is re-imagined as 3D! In this variation of chess, we have 3 parallel boards and the pieces can travel between them.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1.3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 320 MB available space
